title: Live Updates: Joyous Syrians Overflow Mosques for 1st Friday Prayers Since al-Assad’s Fall
content: Crowds chanted and waved revolutionary flags in Damascus and other cities. The celebratory mood belied the challenges facing Syria’s new leaders as they try to bring order after a 13-year civil war.
summary: Crowds chanted and waved revolutionary flags in Damascus and other cities. The celebratory mood belied the challenges facing Syria’s new leaders as they try to bring order after a 13-year civil war.

title: Europe Begins to Ask if Syrians Can Go Home After al-Assad’s Fall
content: Nearly a million Syrians in Germany alone have made new lives. But after the fall of Bashar al-Assad, some politicians across the continent have suggested that refugees could return home.
summary: Nearly a million Syrians in Germany alone have made new lives. But after the fall of Bashar al-Assad, some politicians across the continent have suggested that refugees could return home.

title: Macron Appoints François Bayrou as France’s New Prime Minister
content: François Bayrou, a veteran centrist politician, will now become the fourth prime minister in a year, a record for France.
summary: François Bayrou, a veteran centrist politician, will now become the fourth prime minister in a year, a record for France.

title: Ukrainian Women Are Traveling to the Front Line to Keep Love Alive
content: Many women are making dangerous trips to places where loved ones are fighting Russian forces. “We try to imagine that for these two days, there is no war,” one said.
summary: Many women are making dangerous trips to places where loved ones are fighting Russian forces. “We try to imagine that for these two days, there is no war,” one said.

title: With al-Assad Gone, Syrians Search Prisons for Traces of Their Loved Ones

summary: Guided by cellphone flashlights, relatives searched a notorious lockup in Damascus for traces of loved ones who were snatched during the regime of Bashar al-Assad.

title: Chinese-Flagged Ship Suspected of Cutting Cables Remains Halted Weeks Later
